quote: The most important thing in life will always be family. The people right here, right now.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: Family is not an important thing. It’s everything.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: I’ll love you forever, I’ll like you for always, As long as I’m living, my baby you’ll be.
author: Robert Munsch

quote: Families can be together forever.
author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

quote: The family remains the basic unit of society and the first school in which children learn the human, spiritual and moral values which enable them to be a beacon of goodness, integrity and justice in our communities.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Live so that when your children think of fairness, caring, and integrity, they think of you.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones – the ones at home.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: A Mother’s love is something that no one can explain, It is made of deep devotion and of sacrifice and pain, It is endless and unselfish and enduring come what may For nothing can destroy it or take that love away.
author: Helen Steiner Rice

quote: We are created for community, fashioned for fellowship, and formed for a family, and none of us can fulfill God’s purposes by ourselves.
author: Rick Warren

quote: It is easy to love the people far away. It is not always easy to love those close to us. It is easier to give a cup of rice to relieve hunger than to relieve the loneliness and pain of someone unloved in our own home. Bring love into your home for this is where our love for each other must start.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: You don’t choose your family. They are God’s gift to you, as you are to them.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: The way you help heal the world is you start with your own family.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: If you look deeply into the palm of your hand, you will see your parents and all generations of your ancestors. All of them are alive in this moment. Each is present in your body. You are the continuation of each of these people.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: A man who doesn’t spend time with his family can never be a real man.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: My parents are my backbone. Still are. They’re the only group that will support you if you score zero or you score 40.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Never forget, your family should always have priority over your work.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Good bye may seem forever. Farewell is like the end, but in my heart is the memory and there you will always be.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Our greatest natural resource is the minds of our children.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Many marriages would be better if the husband and wife clearly understood that they’re on the same side.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: My father didn't tell me how to live; he lived, and let me watch him do it.
author: Clarence Budington Kelland

quote: Where there is love, nothing is too much trouble and there is always time.
author: Abdu'l-Bahá

quote: God first, family second, career third.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: The greatest legacy one can pass on to one’s children and grandchildren is not money or other material things accumulated in one’s life, but rather a legacy of character and faith.
author: Billy Graham

quote: To put the world in order, we must first put the nation in order; to put the nation in order, we must first put the family in order; to put the family in order; we must first cultivate our personal life; we must first set our hearts right.
author: Confucius

quote: All that I am or ever hope to be, I owe to my angel mother.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The home is the child’s first school, the parent is the child’s first teacher, and reading is the child’s first subject.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Remember that children, marriages, and flower gardens reflect the kind of care they get.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: If your parents are alive, be grateful at the opportunity to earn Jannah by serving them.
author: Nouman Ali Khan

quote: Trust is the fruit of a relationship in which you know you are loved.
author: Wm. Paul Young

quote: A daughter needs a dad to be the standard against which she will judge all men.
author: Anonymous

quote: The more healthy relationships a child has, the more likely he will be to recover from trauma and thrive. Relationships are the agents of change and the most powerful therapy is human love.
author: Bruce D. Perry

quote: Walking. I am listening to a deeper way. Suddenly all my ancestors are behind me. Be still, they say. Watch and listen. You are the result of the love of thousands.
author: Linda Hogan

quote: Do not use the sharpness of your speech on your mother who taught you how to speak.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I love you and I’m here for you.
author: Will Smith

quote: Mother: the most beautiful word on the lips of mankind.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Marriage: If you want something to last forever, you treat it differently. You shield it and protect it. You never abuse it. You don’t expose it to the elements. You don’t make it common or ordinary. If it ever becomes tarnished, you lovingly polish it until it gleams like new. It becomes special because you have made it so, and it grows more beautiful and precious as time goes by.
author: F. Burton Howard

quote: There is no greater happiness for a man than approaching a door at the end of a day knowing someone on the other side of that door is waiting for the sound of his footsteps.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Dad is a son's first hero and a daughter's first love.
author: Anonymous

quote: Today be thankful and think how rich you are. Your family is priceless, your time is gold and your health is wealth.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: To care for those who once cared for us is one of the highest honors.
author: Tia Walker

quote: We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: Slow down and enjoy the journey right now. Take time for the people in your life. They won’t always be there.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Work hard, but make time for your love, family and friends. Nobody remembers PowerPoint presentations on your final day.
author: Chetan Bhagat

quote: Life is short. Don’t miss opportunities to spend time with the people that you love.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Christmas is the season of joy, of holiday greetings exchanged, of gift-giving, and of families united.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other’s life.
author: Richard Bach

quote: My heroes are and were my parents. I can’t see having anyone else as my heroes.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: A great marriage is not when the perfect couple comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
author: — Dave Meurer

quote: Any man can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad.
author: — Anne Geddes

quote: There is no school equal to a decent home and no teacher equal to a virtuous parent.
author: — Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Women are one half of society which gives birth to the other half so it is as if they are the entire society.
author: — Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyya

quote: The love of a family is life’s greatest blessing.
author: — Eva Burrows

quote: You make each day a special day. You know how, by just your being you.
author: — Fred Rogers

quote: The best way to raise positive children in a negative world is to have positive parents who love them unconditionally and serve as excellent role models.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The question isn’t so much, Are you parenting the right way? as it is: Are you the adult you want your child to grow up to be?
author: — Brené Brown

quote: Your greatest accomplishment may not be something you do but someone you raise.
author: — Andy Stanley

quote: Ain’t a woman alive that could take my mama’s place.
author: — Tupac Shakur

quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
author: — Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Aim high, work hard, and love your family.
author: — Deborah Roberts

quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, lies in its loyalty to each other.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: This is part of what a family is about, not just love. It’s knowing that your family will be there watching out for you. Nothing else will give you that. Not money. Not fame. Not work.
author: — Mitch Albom

quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
author: — Jane Austen

quote: United we stand, divided we fall.
author: — Aesop

quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: — George Bernard Shaw

quote: THINK before you speak. Is it True, Helpful, Inspiring, Necessary, Kind?
author: — Alan Redpath

quote: If you don’t know history, then you don’t know anything. You are a leaf that doesn’t know it is part of a tree.
author: — Michael Crichton

quote: Laughter is an instant vacation.
author: — Milton Berle

quote: Peace in society depends upon peace in the family.
author: — Saint Augustine

quote: Don’t build walls and shut people out of your life. To act as if another does not exist is a mean and cruel weapon.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: All family life is organized around the most damaged person in it.
author: — Sigmund Freud

quote: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
author: — Ruth Bell Graham

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
author: — Martin Luther

quote: God’s dream is that you and I and all of us will realize that we are family, that we are made for togetherness, for goodness, and for compassion.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Your family and your love must be cultivated like a garden. Time, effort, and imagination must be summoned constantly to keep any relationship flourishing and growing.
author: — Jim Rohn

quote: All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
author: — Leo Tolstoy

quote: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do.
author: — Benjamin Spock

quote: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
author: — Erma Bombeck

quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
author: — Charles Dickens

quote: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
author: — Napoleon Hill

quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If it looks like a duck, and quacks like a duck, we have at least to consider the possibility that we have a small aquatic bird of the family anatidae on our hands.
author: — Douglas Adams

quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life’s deepest joy: true fulfillment.
author: — Tony Robbins

quote: Sexiness wears thin after a while and beauty fades, but to be married to a man who makes you laugh every day, ah, now that’s a real treat.
author: — Joanne Woodward

quote: A mother’s love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dares all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
author: — Agatha Christie

quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
author: — Margaret Walker

quote: A child who is allowed to be disrespectful to his parents will not have true respect for anyone.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Once you agree upon the price you and your family must pay for success, it enables you to ignore the minor hurts, the opponent’s pressure, and the temporary failures.
author: — Vince Lombardi

quote: Strangers are just family you have yet to come to know.
author: — Mitch Albom

quote: No matter what you’ve done for yourself or for humanity, if you can’t look back on having given love and attention to your own family, what have you really accomplished?
author: — Lee Iacocca

quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
author: — Peter Marshall

quote: Family connexions were always worth preserving, good company always worth seeking.
author: — Jane Austen

quote: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.
author: — Jim Valvano

quote: I don’t want to be interesting. I want to be good.
author: — Ludwig Mies Van Der Rohe

quote: There are trivial truths and the great truths. The opposite of a trivial truth is plainly false. The opposite of a great truth is also true.
author: — Niels Bohr

quote: Love is not love that alters when it alteration finds.
author: — William Shakespeare

quote: First and foremost comes my family and my life with Brad. We have so much joy in raising our children and teaching them about the world that nothing really compares to that.
author: — Angelina Jolie
